description:
Pirates: All Aboard! is a competitive battle game for solo and multiplayer experiences. 

Rule the seas!
- Choose your ship wisely - Exploit each of thee ships’ strengths ‘n weaknesses
- Skillfully navigate between Caribbean tropical islands on 7 maps!
- Collect all thee power-ups 'n fire devastatin' cannon blasts.
- Be merciless to yee enemies 'n remember  - Dead men tell no tales. 

Enjoy 3 game modes yarr!
1) Practice Mode - Practice will make ye a true Seadog!  
2) Multiplayer (Death Match and Last Man Standing) - All scallywags are needed aboard, brin' yer mates and together commandeer thar seas
3) Endless Mode - show yer agility 'n collect a bounty of treasures, don't let yer ship sink - River Raid style!

Yo Ho Ho!
Weigh Anchor and Hoist the Mizzen!
Aaaarrrrgggghhhh!
name: Pirates: All Aboard!
